cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2011 Honda Pilot with only 100,000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2009 Toyota Camry with only 60,000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
